ComicInfo.Summary: Stargazer Part 1: Living back on Earth, Jean-Luc declines offers from Starfleet to advise on missions until he is recruited by the new captain of the Stargazer, Captain Mekara, to join on a mission to investigate a planet that Picard had previously visited when he was the captain of the Stargazer. Meanwhile, Seven of Nine tries to determine if she has a future in Starfleet.
ComicInfo.Tags: Hiro,Xenius,Chen,Gilaad Ben Zoma,Moshe,Laris,Starfleet,Asmund,Stargazer Crew,Urtern,Mekara,Number One,Jean-Luc Picard,Fenris Rangers,Seven of Nine
ComicInfo.Title: Stargazer Part 1
